{{cpp/chrono/tzdb_list/title|1=front}}

{{dcl begin}}
{{dcl|since=c++20|1=
const std::chrono::tzdb&amp; front() const noexcept;
}}
{{dcl end}}

Obtains a reference to the first {{lc|std::chrono::tzdb}} in the list. Simultaneous calls to this function and {{c|std::chrono::reload_tzdb()}} does not introduce a data race.

===Return value===
A reference to the first {{lc|std::chrono::tzdb}} in the list.
